images.place: Dim Sum Cafe, Las Vegas, Nevada

description:
[Oyster sauce](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oyster_sauce) is a thick dark brown sauce made from oyster extracts, particularly popular in Cantoneses dishes, added to vegetables and noodles.

Vegetarian oyster sauce is available, made with mushrooms.

**Characters**

[蠔](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E8%A0%94) is *oyster*, and [油](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E6%B2%B9) is *oil*, so [蠔油](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E8%A0%94%E6%B2%B9) is *oyster oil*.
